summary: Email correspondence between FBI agents regarding the request for and provision of flight records and a deposition transcript related to the Epstein case. The email includes attachments of a deposition transcript and flight records exhibit.

persons.name: David Rodgers
persons.context: Named in the deposition transcript attachment; appears to be someone whose testimony was recorded.

events.title: David Rodgers Deposition
events.description: Deposition of David Rodgers was taken, transcript is attached to the email.

events.title: Request for Flight Records
events.description: An FBI Special Agent from New York requests flight records via email.

events.title: Provision of Records
events.description: Flight records and deposition transcript are provided in response to the request.

keyFacts: FBI agents were actively exchanging flight records and a deposition transcript related to the Epstein investigation in December 2019.
The deposition of David Rodgers, dated June 3, 2016, was part of the materials being circulated.
Flight records were a specific focus of the investigative correspondence, indicating their relevance to the case.
